import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Grid, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' const _MovieGenresList = () => { const [movieList, setMovieList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchMovies = async e => { try{ // const list = await fetch('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=224ce27b38a3805ecf6f6c36eb3ba9d0&with_genres=28') const list = await fetch('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/') const ll = list.json(); // const images = json.map(x => x.results.backdrop_path); // setMovieList(list.results); setMovieList([list]) console.log(movieList.data); } catch(err) { console.log(err) } } fetchMovies(); }, []); return(
) } export default _MovieGenresList
